item.title: Need for road signs & restrictions, 8th July
item.description:
Cambridge barracks road is a cul de sac, but owing to it being adjacent to parade of shops on Frances street there is a constant stream of cars using it as a turn around at all hours. another issue is that many cars drive at speed in & out, so fast i havent even been able to take reg numbers...many are serial offenders. also, a resident not only speeds but does 'doughnuts' in the small car park behind our block, causing rubber & exhaust fumes. infact his car was towed in at the weekend with the front completely smashed in. my neighbours say they've reported this behaviour but nothing to date has changed. i would like to see a speed limit sign at the entrance to the road; an indication that elderly folk reside there & i hope, a no turning sign - only for access&residence. i sincerely hope something will be done re these issues as they are making mine & neighbours lives very uncomfortable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cambridge Barracks Road, Charlton Riverside, London
Report on FixMyStreet
